newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Artwork says software installations double.
newsitem.headline: Artwork says software installations double.

text.p: Belgian Artwork Systems NV said in a statement on Thursday it had now installed over 2,000 packages of its ArtPro software world wide, twice as many installations as just over a year ago.
The Ghent-based company, which develops and provides professional software packages for the graphics arts industry, said this confirmed its leading position in the sector.
ArtPro software, introduced in 1992, is Artwork System's flagship product targeted at the label and packaging industry.
"Artwork Sytems also announces promising sales results for its ArtPro Repro and ArtColour products," the statement added.
The company has been quoted on the Brussels-based pan-European growth stocks market Easdaq since December last year.
